results.deck: An Action Adventure game based on The LEGO Movie and developed in the style of other TT Games' LEGO videogames.
results.name: The LEGO Movie Videogame

results.deck: Strider Hiryu must assassinate Grandmaster Meio in this action-adventure game from Double Helix and Capcom.
results.name: Strider

results.deck: A tarot card driven roguelike action role playing game, by Defiant Development from Brisbane, Australia.
results.name: Hand of Fate

results.deck: Bridge Constructor is a game in which bridges must be built.
results.name: Bridge Constructor

results.deck: Outed by her own government as a legendary spy, Alyssa must dodge adoring fans and dangerous villains to save the world one more time.
results.name: Cosmic Star Heroine

results.deck: How to Survive is an isometric zombie survival game with hunger mechanics, RPG stat mechanics, crafting and multiple playable characters along with local and online multiplayer options.
results.name: How to Survive

results.deck: SteamWorld Dig is a platforming mining adventure. Old steambot Rusty arrives in a mining town and starts digging his way through the earth below to find riches and eliminate an ancient threat coming from below.
results.name: SteamWorld Dig

results.deck: Kickstarter funded turn based Strategy game inspired by classics such as Battle Isle, Advance Wars, and Panzer General developed by KING Art Games.
results.name: Battle Worlds: Kronos

results.deck: Expand and maintain the Aztec Empire through strategic conquest and brutal, 2D combat. Will support the Oculus Rift on PC.
results.name: Aztez

results.deck: The fifth game in Kalypso's dictatorship simulation series. The game improves on trading, technology and research and adds competitive and cooperative multiplayer for the first time in the series.
results.name: Tropico 5

results.deck: A roguelike role playing game by Over the Top Games.
results.name: Full Mojo Rampage

results.deck: 7 days to die is a Voxel-based, open world sandbox survival game.
results.name: 7 Days to Die

results.deck: Powered by Unreal Engine 4, Fable Legends was meant to be a free to play 4 versus 1 multiplayer game, where 4 players control heroes while 1 player takes the role of the villain. Developed by Lionhead Studios for the Xbox One and PC. It was cancelled in March 2016
results.name: Fable Legends

results.deck: A downloadable game inspired by classic RPGs with turn-based combat from the creative director of Far Cry 3, made using the UbiArt engine powering the most recent Rayman games.
results.name: Child of Light

results.deck: A top down shoot 'em up and platformer in one adventure. Velocity 2X is the sequel to the award winning Velocity, and features fast paced gameplay and a teleport mechanic. The heroine Kai Tana blasts, tele-dashes and jumps through interior sections then returns to her Quarp Jet to continue her fight against the Vokh.
results.name: Velocity 2X

results.deck: SUPERHOT is a puzzling first-person shooter where time progresses as the player moves.
results.name: Superhot

results.deck: A party-based roguelike game with elements of 4X resource management and tower defense.
results.name: Dungeon of the Endless

results.deck: Platforming adventure about a young boy with a big gun, who teams up with a robot in need of a new energy core.
results.name: Kick & Fennick

results.deck: Run, jump, slide, and swing into this 4 player competitive platformer by DoubleDutch Games.
results.name: SpeedRunners

results.deck: Chroma Squad is a turn-based tactical management simulation game.
results.name: Chroma Squad

results.deck: An action-platformer headed by Mega Man creator Keiji Inafune, and crowdfunded via Kickstarter. It is heavily inspired by Inafune's Mega Man franchise.
results.name: Mighty No. 9

results.deck: Upcoming First Person Shooter adaptation of the Space Hulk boardgame set in the Warhammer 40,000 universe. It is being developed by the studio behind E.Y.E: Divine Cybermancy and will use Unreal Engine 4.
results.name: Space Hulk: Deathwing

results.deck: Shantae's fourth adventure, funded through Kickstarter.
results.name: Shantae: 1/2 Genie Hero

results.deck: A Kinect Fighting Game developed for the Xbox One.
results.name: Fighter Within

results.deck: An action role-playing video game developed by NeocoreGames.
results.name: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing II

results.deck: The two legendary puzzle series unite in this crossover title.
results.name: Puyo Puyo Tetris

results.deck: A 2D puzzle adventure from Ubisoft, set against the backdrop of World War I.
results.name: Valiant Hearts: The Great War

results.deck: A 2D action-RPG inspired by A Link to the Past and Diablo developed by Heart Machine.
results.name: Hyper Light Drifter

results.deck: Travel to Africa to hunt the most ferocious beasts alive across 5 different biomes.
results.name: Cabela's African Adventures

results.deck: After a space explorer falls from orbit and is rendered either unconscious or dead, the AI system that runs his armour takes direct control of the suit to try and find her partner some medical help.
results.name: The Fall

results.deck: Xbox Fitness is a subscription based online fitness service built for the Xbox One's Kinect sensor.
results.name: Xbox Fitness

results.deck: Puzzle Quest takes on the Marvel Universe with its match three gameplay. The Dark Reign story line is used as the backdrop for this game.
results.name: Marvel Puzzle Quest

results.deck: A sandbox space game focused on fun and building.
results.name: Space Engineers

results.deck: Wave based first person defense shooter, where the player must mount a turret and fend of hordes of vicious attacking bunnies.
results.name: Blast 'Em Bunnies

results.deck: A Beenox-developed sequel to the open world web-slinging game. High Voltage Software is developing the 3DS version.
results.name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2

results.deck: A '70s B-Movie game where the player drives a constantly revolving limousine! Pick up passengers, find secret collectibles, take on dangerous missions, and fall in love in a far out open world puzzle adventure.
results.name: Roundabout

results.deck: A first person survival adventure simulation set in a post-disaster environment in the Northern American wilderness. Developed by Hinterland Studios Inc.
results.name: The Long Dark

results.deck: A survival horror game set fifteen years after the original Alien film. It stars Amanda Ripley, the daughter of the film's protagonist, Ellen Ripley.
results.name: Alien: Isolation

results.deck: An on-rails shooter for the PC, Xbox One and Playstation 4, designed for use with the Leap Motion peripheral(PC). Based on the comic book series Blue Estate.
results.name: Blue Estate

results.deck: EA Sports brings their golf franchise to PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.
results.name: Rory McIlroy PGA Tour

results.deck: A first-person survival horror adventure amongst the mountains and fjords of the Norwegian west coast in the 1920s.
results.name: Draugen

results.deck: Videoball is a competitive multiplayer game for up to six players that combines elements of first-person shooters, real-time strategy, and conventional sports in a top-down, arcade-style game.
results.name: Videoball

results.deck: Astral Terra is an endless sandbox role playing game by Tethys Interactive for PC, initially releasing on Steam.  Founders packs are available now via astralterra.com which allows immediate access to the latest game build.
results.name: Astral Terra

results.deck: Mitsurugi Kamui Hikae is an arena-based character action game that focuses on combos and eliminating multiple foes at once by sheathing your sword.
results.name: Mitsurugi Kamui Hikae

results.deck: An open-world action-adventure game by Monolith, set between the events of The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings.
results.name: Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor

results.deck: LEGO returns to Middle-earth with this video game adaptation of the first two Hobbit movies.
results.name: LEGO The Hobbit

results.deck: A spin-off of the Borderlands series of first-person shooters, Tales from the Borderlands is an episodic adventure game where a reluctant group of civilians try to strike it rich in the hostile world of Pandora.
results.name: Tales from the Borderlands

results.deck: Based on the epic-fantasy television series of the same name, Game of Thrones is an episodic adventure game that tells the story of House Forrester, whose fate is threatened by the War of the Five Kings.
results.name: Game of Thrones: A Telltale Game Series

results.deck: Chaos;Child is the fourth major entry in the Science Adventure franchise of visual novels.
results.name: Chaos;Child

results.deck: A pool game for the PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC containing no less than 100% all-natural billiards.
results.name: Pure Pool

results.deck: Silence is the sequel to Daedalic Entertainment’s popular fantasy adventure game The Whispered World and features a new lead character and 3D graphics.
results.name: Silence: The Whispered World 2

results.deck: Dex is a sidescrolling cyberpunk action/stealth-RPG funded through Kickstarter. Inspired by classic cyperpunk novels, the game lets players explore the hand-drawn city of Harbor Prime.
results.name: Dex

results.deck: Kickstarter funded futuristic sports game inspired by the developer's work on the swinging mechanic in 2004's Spider-Man 2 game.
results.name: Energy Hook

results.deck: A medieval open world RPG focused on period-accurate fighting and technique.
results.name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance

results.deck: Towards the end of the interstellar wars, when chaos spread, one band of elite mercenaries acted more like pirates and looters than actual soldiers. The leader of this group was the notorious and infamous Colonel Nestor.
results.name: 1993 Space Machine

results.deck: Grave is a survival horror experience set in an open world, currently available for PC, Mac, consoles and Oculus Rift.
results.name: Grave

results.deck: A multiplayer-focused game that features narwhals battling in space.
results.name: Starwhal

results.deck: A first-person shooter that is attempting to blur the line between single player and multiplayer, developed by The Farm 51.
results.name: Get Even

results.deck: A 2D co-op shooter-platformer focused on boss battles. It is known for its unique art style, which imitates the more surreal cartoons of the 1930s.
results.name: Cuphead

results.deck: The 2015 Midwinter reboot is a open world, first person, action role playing game with strategy elements.
results.name: Midwinter

results.deck: Major League Baseball is getting into the video game business with the release of a new game that says "RBI Baseball" right on the (digital) cover.
results.name: R.B.I. Baseball 14

results.deck: An action focused free to play MMORPG based on Japanese mythology.
results.name: Onigiri

results.deck: An upcoming game in the Call of Cthulhu franchise from Cyanide Studio and Focus Home Interactive.
results.name: Call of Cthulhu - The Video Game

results.deck: The sixth game in IO Interactive's sneaky murder sim franchise, simply titled Hitman, adopts an episodic design wherein it will continually introduce new assassination contracts for players to undertake.
results.name: Hitman

results.deck: A next generation Golf Simulator developed by HB Studios.
results.name: The Golf Club

results.deck: Twenty five years have passed since the decimation of the Locust & Lambent threats on the planet Sera. However a new race of monsters have taken their place and JD Fenix, son of series protagonist Marcus Fenix, has taken up the mantle in helping to protect humanity.
results.name: Gears of War 4

results.deck: Frantic high-speed aerial-combat action game played in 1st or 3rd person.
results.name: Strike Vector

results.deck: WWE 2K15 is the first game in the franchise to appear on the Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC.
results.name: WWE 2K15

results.deck: Basketball returns in NBA 2K15.
results.name: NBA 2K15

results.deck: The eleventh installment of the Call of Duty franchise (and the first spearheaded by Sledgehammer Games) brings modern military thirty years into the future, as new technology (including powered exoskeleton frames and cloaking devices) makes a certain Private Military Corporation the dominant military force of the world.
results.name: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare

results.deck: Necrosoft is working on a followup to Gunhouse called Gunsport.
results.name: Gunsport

results.deck: Threes! is a tiny puzzle game from the creators of Puzzlejuice.
results.name: Threes!

results.deck: The latest entry of the Worms franchise comes to the PS4 and Xbox One in 2014.
results.name: Worms Battlegrounds

results.deck: A space-based, first-person puzzle game revolving around an astronaut trying to repair a heavily damaged space station orbiting the Earth.
results.name: Adr1ft

results.deck: In this parody of inaccurate and terribly made "Simulator" games, an indestructible goat wreaks havoc on a vaguely European sandbox world plagued by buggy physics and non-sequiturs.
results.name: Goat Simulator

results.deck: A stealth and infiltration game, with elements of RPG. The game is a spin-off from Cyanide Studio's Of Orcs and Men featuring the goblin protagonist Styx.
results.name: Styx: Master of Shadows

results.deck: In this quasi-sequel to Chip's Challenge, an extraterrestrial puzzle fiend summons Chuck Sommerville (the creator of Chip's Challenge) to create a universe of wacky puzzles for him to solve.
results.name: Chuck's Challenge 3D

results.deck: A new Transformers game headed to multiple platforms across home consoles and PC.
results.name: Transformers: Rise of the Dark Spark

results.deck: A multiplayer puzzle game.
results.name: Tumblestone

results.deck: A new freestyle scooter game for the new console trio developed by Renegade Kid in partnership with Razor licensee Scarab Entertainment. The game was supposedly canceled due to publisher issues.
results.name: Razor Global Domination Pro Tour

results.deck: A HD reimagining of the 2001 cartoon car combat game for Xbox, Gamecube and PS2.
results.name: Cel Damage HD

results.deck: A futuristic watercraft racer.
results.name: Riptide GP2

results.deck: An overhead shooter awfully reminiscent of the old "Strike" games.
results.name: Project Root

results.deck: Arkham Knight, developer Rocksteady's return to the Batman series, takes place one year after Arkham City. It promises to expand the open world from the previous game, allowing players to drive the Batmobile through Gotham City's streets.
results.name: Batman: Arkham Knight

results.deck: Shadow Blade is a fast-paced ninja game.
results.name: Shadow Blade

results.deck: A beat 'em up sequel to 1994's Shaquille O'Neal-based fighting game Shaq Fu.
results.name: Shaq Fu: A Legend Reborn

results.deck: A turn-based RPG that takes place during Halloween.
results.name: Costume Quest 2

results.deck: The world's first turn-based real-time puzzle game developed by Funktronic Labs.
results.name: Nova-111

results.deck: Mobile games Tiny Troopers 1 & 2 combined and reworked into console twinstick shooters.
results.name: Tiny Troopers: Joint Ops

results.deck: A survival-strategy game set in the shadow of a devastating war, This War of Mine examines the impact of war on the civilians, not the soldiers.
results.name: This War of Mine

results.deck: An eight-player simultaneous local/online competitive multiplayer game, taking advantage of Xbox One's ability to use 8 controllers on a single console. #IDARB may also be the first game to ever use a hashtag in its title.
results.name: #IDARB

results.deck: Bongfish is developing this spiritual successor to Harms Way, the Doritos game.
results.name: Calibre 10 Racing Series

results.deck: Players use both the Kinect and a controller to complete platforming puzzles by masking the level with the shadow of the player's body.
results.name: Fru

results.deck: Chariot is a co-op platformer for Xbox One, Playstation 4, PC, and the Nintendo Wii U, starring a Princess and her Fiancé on a mission to transport their deceased King's coffin to its final resting place.
results.name: Chariot

results.deck: Hover: Revolt of Gamers is a first and third person open world parkour roller-skating game inspired by the likes of Jet Set Radio, Mirror's Edge, and the Tony Hawk series.
results.name: Hover: Revolt of Gamers

results.deck: The Assassin's Creed series heads to Paris, France, amid the French Revolution. The player controls Arno Dorian, an Assassin, as he attempts to disrupt and destroy the true powers behind the Revolution.
results.name: Assassin's Creed Unity

results.deck: A cricket game for PC, Xbox 360, PS3, Xbox One and PS4, bearing the name of the late, legendary Australian batsman Don Bradman.
results.name: Don Bradman Cricket 14

results.deck: A procedural generated roguelike dungeon crawler with a classic look.
results.name: Quest of Dungeons

results.deck: A 2D, side-scrolling shooter from the makers of OlliOlli.
results.name: Not a Hero

results.deck: Return life to a dying world as a bioluminescent butterfly in this metroidvania-style game from Fenix Fire.
results.name: Source
